tasks.name: Games added to Prod Ops roadmap
tasks.summary: Prod Ops maintain an up to date roadmap that Game Ops use as the source of truth for upcoming releases.
gameOpsActions: Check that roadmap entries exist for upcoming weeks
Verify statuses and dependencies are ready for Game Ops work

externalTeams.etaDescription: Prod Ops typically stay ahead so Game Ops rarely wait

outputs: Confirmed list of games planned for release
tasks.alreadyImproved: Roadmap centralised in Monday with basic automations.
tasks.easyImprovements: Migrate roadmap to Jira without losing automation.
tasks.automationPotential: Read roadmap from Jira API and drive release orchestration automatically.
tasks.currentPain: Dependency on Monday for automations and risk of losing them if board is removed.
tasks.dreamState: Single roadmap system integrated with release orchestrator with no manual checks.

tasks.name: Confirm games into Game Ops roadmap
tasks.summary: Game Ops confirm which games they will work on, based on Prod Ops entries.
gameOpsActions: Confirm games in the Game Ops view or board
Check that roadmap automations ran correctly
tasks.alreadyImproved: Games move from Add section into grouped roadmap boards.
tasks.easyImprovements: Auto promote roadmap entries into Game Ops board once criteria are met.
tasks.automationPotential: Replace manual confirmation with rules based promotion plus Contentful flags.
tasks.currentPain: Manual verification and fragile automations.
tasks.dreamState: Game Ops board is an automatic filtered view on the single roadmap source.

tasks.name: Game Ops create and maintain Math sheet
tasks.summary: Export roadmap data and maintain a math sheet used as a staging area for configs.
gameOpsActions: Export Monday board
Clean exported Excel
Update math sheet with required fields per game

externalTeams.etaDescription: Prod Ops update roadmap throughout the month

tasks.alreadyImproved: Math sheet generated from roadmap rather than stand alone.
tasks.easyImprovements: Generate sheet automatically from backend and store centrally.
tasks.automationPotential: Eliminate math sheet by pushing all required numeric fields into Contentful GamePlatformConfig.
tasks.currentPain: Duplicate data entry and opportunity for mismatch between sheet and CMS.
tasks.dreamState: Single backend source for math and config data with no Excel dependency.

tasks.name: Release ticket created and enriched
tasks.summary: Release tickets are automatically created when roadmap entries are added and Game Ops enrich them with IDs.
gameOpsActions: Add game code and game ID to the release ticket
Keep ticket fields in sync with roadmap and CMS

externalTeams.etaDescription: Tickets created automatically when lines are added on the board

tasks.alreadyImproved: Automatic ticket creation and merged patching and game tickets.
tasks.easyImprovements: Sync identifiers automatically from Contentful or Cabo once created.
tasks.automationPotential: Lambda that keeps Jira ticket fields in sync with Contentful game entries.
tasks.currentPain: Manual copy paste of IDs into tickets.
tasks.dreamState: Ticket fields auto populated from orchestrator and never edited manually.

tasks.name: Game tiles added to design board and created
tasks.summary: Game tiles are requested, designed and attached to games.
gameOpsActions: Create design tickets with game info and requirements
Update statuses on design tickets
Download or collect assets from providers when needed

externalTeams.etaDescription: Design works through tile tickets and provides assets

outputs: Approved tile images per venture and game
tasks.alreadyImproved: Tiles and approvals moved from Excel to Monday board and Jira.
tasks.easyImprovements: Centralised asset download from provider or Bynder.
tasks.automationPotential: Asset ingestion Lambda that fetches provider assets, creates Bynder assets and attaches URLs into Contentful automatically.
tasks.currentPain: High manual volume and coordination between Game Ops, design and compliance.
tasks.dreamState: Game creation automatically spawns tile work, design delivers to Bynder, and Contentful auto gets the correct variant.

tasks.name: Game tile upload to GitHub
tasks.summary: Final tiles are uploaded to GitHub repos used by the web front ends.
gameOpsActions: Download tiles from design
Rename and organise files
Upload to the correct GitHub repo
Update any references
tasks.alreadyImproved: Scripts used to rename files and JPJ and VGN merged into one repo.
tasks.easyImprovements: Push tiles through automated pipeline from Bynder to CDN.
tasks.automationPotential: Replace GitHub upload with CDN pipelines and reference images only by URL from Contentful.
tasks.currentPain: Manual file handling and Git workflows for images.
tasks.dreamState: No direct GitHub interaction by Game Ops for assets.

tasks.name: Request Hasbro approval
tasks.summary: Send Monopoly themed games and countries for Hasbro brand approval.
gameOpsActions: Export relevant games from roadmap
Prepare list of names and countries
Send to provider or Hasbro contact
tasks.alreadyImproved: Uses roadmap exports rather than manual gathering.
tasks.easyImprovements: Prod Ops could trigger approvals while building roadmaps.
tasks.automationPotential: Trigger Hasbro approval requests via provider API when roadmap item is created.
tasks.currentPain: Long external lead time and manual tracking.
tasks.dreamState: Hasbro approval status visible in Jira and Contentful automatically.

tasks.name: Send off bet configs to providers
tasks.summary: Request bet configuration changes from each provider.
gameOpsActions: Prepare bet config details per game and region
Send to providers via email or portals
Chase confirmations
tasks.alreadyImproved: Standardised templates for requests.
tasks.easyImprovements: Store desired bet configs in CMS and export automatically.
tasks.automationPotential: Lambda pushes config changes to provider APIs and updates status in Jira and Contentful.
tasks.currentPain: Heavy email work and inconsistent responses.
tasks.dreamState: Bet configs orchestrated via APIs and centrally tracked with no email.

tasks.name: Set up games in Cabo stage
tasks.summary: Create or configure games in Cabo stage with correct IDs and RTP.
gameOpsActions: Use software ID and RTP from patch and config sheets
Create or update game records in Cabo stage
outputs: Configured game entry in Cabo stage
tasks.alreadyImproved: Standard forms used for Cabo data entry.
tasks.easyImprovements: Drive Cabo stage setup directly from CMS values.
tasks.automationPotential: Lambda that syncs CMS game configuration into Cabo via API.
tasks.currentPain: Manual data entry and risk of mismatch.
tasks.dreamState: Cabo is a projection of CMS config with no manual work.

tasks.name: Create stage patches
tasks.summary: Create patch configuration for staging environment.
gameOpsActions: Use Cabo ID, software ID and RTP to create patch entries
Populate patch forms in Contentful or internal tools
tasks.alreadyImproved: Patch forms standardised.
tasks.easyImprovements: Auto generate patch entities per game from CMS config.
tasks.automationPotential: Patch writer Lambda triggered when game config is ready.
tasks.currentPain: Manual patch creation and duplication.
tasks.dreamState: Patches generated and updated by orchestration logic only.

tasks.name: Spanish regulatory name and form
tasks.summary: Ensure Spanish regulatory naming and forms are completed for games in ES.
gameOpsActions: Request Spanish regulatory name from compliance
Fill Spanish regulatory form entries in Contentful for staging
tasks.alreadyImproved: Forms centralised in Contentful.
tasks.easyImprovements: Standardise fields and validations for Spain.
tasks.automationPotential: Workflow steps and action functions to route ES games to compliance and back.
tasks.currentPain: Manual back and forth and risk of missing fields.
tasks.dreamState: Spain specific fields are just part of the normal game config workflow.

tasks.name: Build games in Contentful
tasks.summary: Create and clone game entries in Contentful including game and siteGame.
gameOpsActions: Create game model and siteGame entries for base venture
Clone siteGame to other ventures
Decide which ventures a given game should go to
tasks.alreadyImproved: Single model used and entries cloned rather than rebuilt.
tasks.easyImprovements: Auto clone and venture mapping rules.
tasks.automationPotential: App action that creates game and siteGame entries and clones across ventures based on config.
tasks.currentPain: Manual creation and cloning, risk of inconsistent flags.
tasks.dreamState: Game definitions created from a single release command with no manual cloning.

tasks.name: Request and apply copywriting
tasks.summary: Request copy, receive it and paste into Contentful fields.
gameOpsActions: Send list of games needing copy to copywriters
Receive copy and paste HTML into Contentful

externalTeams.etaDescription: Provide copy ahead of release where possible

tasks.alreadyImproved: Using lists instead of one-off requests.
tasks.easyImprovements: Store copy directly on Jira or Contentful with collaborative editing.
tasks.automationPotential: Copy fields integrated in Contentful workflows with minimal Game Ops involvement.
tasks.currentPain: Manual mail and copy paste prone to errors.
tasks.dreamState: Copy is authored directly on CMS entries by copywriters.

tasks.name: Staging testing and compliance checks
tasks.summary: Run staging test plans and verify RTP, configs and compliance.
gameOpsActions: Follow TestRail test plans
Check RTP and config match spec
Confirm Spain specific requirements
tasks.alreadyImproved: Consistent use of TestRail.
tasks.easyImprovements: Automated regression for simple checks.
tasks.automationPotential: Automated smoke tests and status updates into Jira.
tasks.currentPain: Manual test runs and duplication of test evidence.
tasks.dreamState: Most checks automated with dashboards, humans focus on edge cases.

tasks.name: Add metadata while testing
tasks.summary: Add theme and feature metadata to games while playing them.
gameOpsActions: Play the game on staging
Determine theme and feature tags
Update Contentful fields
tasks.alreadyImproved: Metadata stored in Contentful instead of multiple sheets.
tasks.easyImprovements: Prod Ops prefill expected theme and features.
tasks.automationPotential: Metadata entry from Prod Ops fields or taxonomy plus rule based defaults.
tasks.currentPain: Research heavy and slow for Game Ops.
tasks.dreamState: Prod Ops own metadata as part of content planning and CMS entry.

tasks.name: Report issues to providers
tasks.summary: Raise issues during staging or live with providers and chase until resolved.
gameOpsActions: Raise issue via email, portal or Skype
Attach screenshots and steps
Chase provider for updates

externalTeams.etaDescription: Response time varies by provider and severity

tasks.alreadyImproved: Some standard channels per provider.
tasks.easyImprovements: Unified issue template and tracking.
tasks.automationPotential: Issue gateway Lambda that logs issues into Jira and provider APIs and syncs statuses.
tasks.currentPain: Fragmented channels and no single view on issue status.
tasks.dreamState: Single issue tracker bridging providers and internal view.

tasks.name: Director approval for live hidden
tasks.summary: Director reviews dashboard and approves games to move to live hidden.
gameOpsActions: Prepare dashboard or list of games ready
Ensure Jira reflects readiness
Chase directors for sign off

externalTeams.etaDescription: A few days per approval run

tasks.alreadyImproved: Use Jira dashboard instead of ad hoc approvals.
tasks.easyImprovements: Combine approvals for live hidden and live into single event.
tasks.automationPotential: Contentful workflow + Jira status transition triggered by director action in CMS.
tasks.currentPain: High aggregate time and waiting for manual approval.
tasks.dreamState: Single click approval in orchestrator app with full audit trail.

tasks.name: Add patch and reg form to production
tasks.summary: Promote staging patch and regulatory forms to production.
gameOpsActions: Update patch configuration for production
Copy or promote regulatory form entries
tasks.alreadyImproved: Structured reg forms.
tasks.easyImprovements: Promote via automation rather than copy paste.
tasks.automationPotential: Patch promotion Lambda triggered when workflow moves to ReadyForProd.
tasks.currentPain: Manual promotion and risk of mismatch between staging and prod.
tasks.dreamState: Single config promotion step that handles both patch and reg forms.

tasks.name: Release managers progress tickets
tasks.summary: Release managers move Jira tickets through final states.
gameOpsActions: Coordinate with release managers
Ensure tickets contain required evidence for transitions
tasks.alreadyImproved: Unified ticket types.
tasks.easyImprovements: Auto transition tickets when orchestration steps complete.
tasks.automationPotential: Orchestrator updates Jira states directly.
tasks.currentPain: Manual clicking across many tickets.
tasks.dreamState: Tickets reflect orchestration status automatically.

tasks.name: Add games to live hidden
tasks.summary: Configure games as live hidden before full release.
gameOpsActions: Tick correct live hidden flags in Contentful or back office
Map games into live hidden placement lists
outputs: Games live hidden but not visible by default
tasks.easyImprovements: Drive live hidden change via automated placement index.
tasks.automationPotential: Orchestrator updates placements indices and Contentful flags automatically.
tasks.currentPain: Repetitive flag ticking.
tasks.dreamState: Live hidden is just a workflow state value rather than manual flags.

tasks.name: Test live hidden games
tasks.summary: Smoke test games live hidden in production.
gameOpsActions: Tick production flags
Perform smoke tests on wallet, spins, RTP and configs
outputs: Verified games ready for full release
tasks.easyImprovements: Template test scenarios and partly automate.
tasks.automationPotential: Automated smoke tests with results stored against game entry.
tasks.currentPain: Manual tests repeated per game.
tasks.dreamState: Automated run for standard behaviour with dashboard view.

tasks.name: Production issues raised with providers
tasks.summary: Handle issues found after go live.
gameOpsActions: Raise live issue tickets with providers
Coordinate fixes and retests
tasks.easyImprovements: Centralised incident template.
tasks.automationPotential: Same as issue gateway in staging.
tasks.currentPain: Fragmented and manual.
tasks.dreamState: Single incident view and bi directional sync with providers.

tasks.name: Add UKGC reference
tasks.summary: Ensure games are registered with UKGC and references are captured.
gameOpsActions: Log into UKGC website
Add game details or fetch reference
Update documentation and CMS
outputs: UKGC ref recorded for each game
tasks.easyImprovements: Partly template the submission data.
tasks.automationPotential: Limited if UKGC has no integration, but we can store refs centrally.
tasks.currentPain: Manual website work and risk of blocking release.
tasks.dreamState: UKGC reference is simple lookup from organised store.

tasks.name: Release games to players
tasks.summary: Place games onto carousels, tabs and special sections.
gameOpsActions: Place games on new games carousels and relevant tabs
Apply rating and venture specific placements
Update jackpot or exclusive pages when applicable
outputs: Games visible to players in correct positions
tasks.alreadyImproved: Batch updates where possible.
tasks.easyImprovements: Placement orchestrated via OpenSearch index rather than manual lists.
tasks.automationPotential: Placement writer Lambda that updates indices based on configuration.
tasks.currentPain: Manual placements for many surfaces.
tasks.dreamState: One dataset drives placements across all surfaces and platforms.

tasks.name: Request removal of games
tasks.summary: Raise Jira REL tickets and obtain director approval for game removals.
gameOpsActions: Create removal ticket in Jira
Collect justifications
Chase director approval
tasks.alreadyImproved: No more email approvals, fully in Jira.
tasks.easyImprovements: Standard templates per removal type.
tasks.automationPotential: Removal requests triggered by metrics and executed via orchestrator.
tasks.currentPain: Manual ticket creation.
tasks.dreamState: Removals scheduled with one click and tracked end to end.

tasks.name: Remove games from sites
tasks.summary: Remove games from all placements and disable them.
gameOpsActions: Remove games from sections or carousels
Untick production flags or equivalent
Run removal tool where available
outputs: Games removed from all user facing surfaces
tasks.alreadyImproved: Contentful removal tool exists but is unreliable.
tasks.easyImprovements: Fix and harden removal tool.
tasks.automationPotential: Remove via game placements index and content flags automatically.
tasks.currentPain: Manual multi place removal and unreliable tool.
tasks.dreamState: Single command to decommission a game across all placements.

tasks.name: Confirm games are gone
tasks.summary: Verify on desktop and mobile that removed games are truly gone.
gameOpsActions: Check front end on multiple devices
Spot check search and carousels
tasks.easyImprovements: Automated UI smoke tests.
tasks.automationPotential: Automated checks using test scripts hitting search and placements APIs.
tasks.currentPain: Manual check across many surfaces.
tasks.dreamState: Automated tests verify removal and feed into Jira.
